name: SetPlayerObjectMaterialText
notes: Color embedding can be used for multiple colors in the text.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3e and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Replace the texture of a player object with text.
params_title: (playerid, objectid, text[], materialindex = 0, materialsize = OBJECT_MATERIAL_SIZE_256x128, fontface[] = "Arial", fontsize = 24, bold = 1, fontcolor = 0xFFFFFFFF, backcolor = 0, textalignment = 0)

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player whose player object to set the text of.

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the object on which to place the text.

params_body.name: materialindex
params_body.description: The material index to replace with text (DEFAULT: 0).

params_body.name: bold
params_body.description: Bold text. Set to 1 for bold, 0 for not (DEFAULT: 1).

params_body.name: fontcolor
params_body.description: The color of the text (DEFAULT: White).

params_body.name: textalignment
params_body.description: The alignment of the text (DEFAULT: Left).

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
SetObjectMaterialText: Replace the texture of an object with text.
 SetPlayerObjectMaterial: Replace the texture of a player object with the texture from another model in the game.
